content: knitted socks with nordic pattern in drops nord size 35 to 43 theme christmas drops design pattern no-051 yarn group a **size** 35/37 - 38/40 - 41/43 foot length 22-24-27 cm leg height down to heel approx 17-18-19 cm **materials** drops nord from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100-100 g colour 19 forest green 50-50-50 g colour 03 pearl grey needles drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm **knitting gauge** 26 stitches in width and 34 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm
